=== xdg-mime ===
xdg mime manager

xdg-mime query default x-scheme-handler/http

xdg-mime query filetype photo.jpg

xdg-mime default chromium.desktop x-scheme-handler/http

=== xdg-open ===

== xrandr ==
config it to rotate to left

`xrandr --output VGA1 --rotate left`
